entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
